title: Replace Product Banner Sample 1–4 fallback images and ensure updated build output

requirements.summary: Overwrite the four static fallback Product Banner sample images (Sample 1–4) so the sample selector displays the newly provided designs when backend samples are missing.
acceptanceCriteria: The following public URLs still exist and return images, but now display the newly provided designs: `/assets/generated/sample1.dim_1200x800.jpg`, `/assets/generated/sample2.dim_1200x800.jpg`, `/assets/generated/sample3.dim_1200x800.jpg`, `/assets/generated/sample4.dim_1200x800.jpg`.

The four new images are applied in sequence using the first four uploaded files in the upload order: (1) `Screenshot_20260213-192911 (1).png` → Sample 1, (2) `Screenshot_20260213-192903 (1).png` → Sample 2, (3) `Screenshot_20260213-192858 (1).png` → Sample 3, (4) `Screenshot_20260213-192911 (1)-1.png` → Sample 4.
Old sample images are no longer present in the repository under those sample1–sample4 filenames (they are overwritten/replaced).
On the Dashboard ordering flow sample selector (`frontend/src/components/ProductSampleSelector.tsx`), selecting Sample 1–4 shows the replaced images (via fallbackUrl when backend samples are null).
